course_url.title: Course URL
course_url.description: URL of the course you wnat to scrape

email.title: Registered e-mail
email.description: The registered e-mail ID on the openedx instance

password.title: Password
password.description: Password to the account registered on the openedx instance

instance_login_page.title: Login page path
instance_login_page.description: The login path in the instance. Must start with /

instance_course_page.title: Course page path
instance_course_page.description: The path to the course page after the course ID. Must start with /

instance_course_prefix.title: Course prefix path
instance_course_prefix.description: The prefix in the path before the course ID. Must start and end with /

favicon_url.title: Favicon URL
favicon_url.description: URL pointing to a favicon image. Recommended size >= (48px x 48px)

add_wiki.title: Include wiki
add_wiki.description: Add wiki (if available) to the ZIM

add_forum.title: Include forum
add_forum.description: Add forum/discussion (if available) to the ZIM

remove_seq_nav.title: No top sequential navigation
remove_seq_nav.description: Remove the top sequential navigation bar in the ZIM

video_format.title: Video format
video_format.description: Format to download/transcode video to. webm is smaller

autoplay.title: Autoplay videos
autoplay.description: Enable autoplay on videos. Behavior differs on platforms/browsers

name.title: Name
name.description: ZIM name. Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended)

title.title: Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Based on MOOC otherwise

description.title: Description
description.description: Custom description for your ZIM. Based on MOOC otherwise

creator.title: Content Creator
creator.description: Name of content creator. Defaults to edX

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Custom publisher name (ZIM metadata). openZIM otherwise

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of comma-separated Tags for the ZIM file. category:other, and openedx added automatically

optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: URL with credentials and bucket name to S3 Optimization Cache

use_any_optimized_version.title: Use any optimized version
use_any_optimized_version.description: Use the cached files if present, whatever the version

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

tmp_dir.title: Temp folder
tmp_dir.description: Where to create temporay build folder. Leave it as `/output`

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on --name if not provided)

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of parallel threads to use while downloading

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: The locale to use for the translations in ZIM
